960620.name: Masters of Puzzle - Halloween Edition: Pumpkin Garden House
960620.description:
With Pumpkin Garden House we would like to introduce you to the wonderful art of the Polish illustrator Elwira Pawlikowska. This puzzle box is the first in our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2018 event. We hope that you will enjoy the fresh and unique art, the challenge, and have a great time building this puzzle in all the available variations.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The UHD image captures the original illustration in great detail and you will be able to observe even the finest of details exactly as the artist has painted them on the canvas. The puzzle as such is of moderate difficulty, presenting many distinct areas to concentrate upon while also having certain elements that would aim to trick your eye. The border of the illustration will also provide a significant challenge, especially on higher puzzle tilesets, so it might not be the wisest move to start from it.
960620.supported_languages: 英语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 德语
